name: Master Solitaire Classic
description:
Are you really into playing Solitaire Games? Do you want to always keep your favourite Card Games handy?

Solitaire Collection is right for you!

All the best Solitaire Games collected in a single app. Klondike, Spider and FreeCell just to name a few... ready for you in a stylish and smart graphics.

It is a original classic cards game designed for Solitaire lovers and every new player (also known as Klondike or Patience)-- Easy to play and Full of fun. Solitaire game play can be simple and fast to start but not so easy to master. More and more users are joining us and having hours of fun everyday!

Open game tap or drag cards, bet you like these game highlights--
- Classic look but modern options, clean and intuitive design for smooth experiences!
- Vivid instruction with pictures to show. All helps you learn fast and sharpen your game skills!
- Unlock more challenges with different levels. Hurry up to complete and Get cool Badges!
- Create your own solitaire game world, customize with lots of wonderful themes and cards skins, choose Classic or Compact layout to make yourself comfortable.

## GAME FEATURES
In this game you'll find all classic solitaire games:

Klondike: The card piles in board, can be build down by decrescent card rank with alternate colors. The goal is to build up four foundation by suit, from ace to king! Two game modes available: 1 card, and 3 cards.
Spider: Cards can be built in rank descending order. You can pick and drag only cards of the same suit! Three game modes available: 1 suit, 2 suits, and 4 suits.
Freecell: The card piles in board, can be build down by decrescent card rank with alternate colors. You can use a free cell to temporarily discard a card. Anyway this will reduce the number of cards you can drag simultaneously. The goal is to build up four foundations by suit, from ace to king!

Download it NOW--
- Time to get yourself relaxed and have fun hours, just so easily!
- Use your Intelligence to play our solitaire game and train brain every day!
- We never stop adding new things and always keep optimizing game experiences for our fans!
